modDesc.title: FS25 Farm Tax Manager
modDesc.description: Manage your farm like a pro with the Farm Tax Manager. This mod introduces a dynamic farm tax system based on Virginia’s real agricultural and property tax rates. Taxes are automatically calculated monthly from your land ownership and income, with HUD notifications. Built by CriderGPT — visit https://cridergpt.lovable.app/ for more AI-powered tools for FS22 and FS25. Console-compatible and ModHub-ready.
